statusLine.command: input=$(cat); model=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.model.display_name'); usage=$(echo "$input" | jq '.context_window.current_usage'); if [ "$usage" != "null" ]; then current=$(echo "$usage" | jq '.input_tokens + .cache_creation_input_tokens + .cache_read_input_tokens + .output_tokens'); size=$(echo "$input" | jq '.context_window.context_window_size'); current_k=$((current / 1000)); size_k=$((size / 1000)); printf '\033[34m%s\033[0m \033[33m[%dk/%dk]\033[0m' "$model" "$current_k" "$size_k"; else printf '\033[34m%s\033[0m' "$model"; fi
